entry.title: About my kernel pwn repository
entry.summary: In the spring semester of 2021, I had to do a semester project at the university. This course is about finding a specialization-related topic and an advisor, then the student needs to work on that topic during the semester. I chose the topic ‘Security Analysis of Embedded Software at the Binary Level’ which was proposed by TASZK Security Labs, where I am working since then. When I first got the...

entry.title: Generating shellcode with pwntool's shellcraft
entry.summary: A beginner CTF challenge Recently I decided to learn more about binary exploitation. I found pwnable.kr, which is a platform containing pwn challenges with different difficulties. To warm up a little bit and to get to know this platform’s eco system I started solving the challenges in the ‘Toddler’s Bottle’ category, which is the easiest one. These are really for beginners, some of them are ra...
